RESUME_TIPS: Enhance your resume by explicitly mentioning your experience with **demand forecasting** techniques. Add a line under your Senior Analyst role detailing how you used historical sales data and **seasonality** to improve forecast accuracy, directly aligning with the job's responsibilities.

Showcase your knowledge of **replenishment** strategies by adding a section on how you managed **min max levels** and automated **stock movement** in your previous roles. Include examples of how you reduced **stock outs** while optimizing inventory levels, demonstrating practical expertise.

Detail your experience with **inventory optimization** techniques in the Zast Logisolutions role. Mention how you tracked **inventory turnover**, analyzed **aging stock**, and proposed actions to minimize losses from slow-moving items, emphasizing the financial impact.

Include specific examples of dashboards you built for **inventory health** and **store performance**, highlighting your ability to automate **reporting** using **Power BI** and **SQL**. Quantify the improvements achieved, such as increased forecast accuracy or reduced overstock percentage.

Expand on your project experience by describing any exposure to **omnichannel inventory** management, especially if it involved integrating **retail** and **online/marketplaces** data. Mention any challenges you overcame and the solutions you implemented.

Incorporate experience with **ABC classification** by adding a bullet point under your Data Analyst role describing how you categorized inventory based on value and optimized **replenishment** strategies accordingly. Mention the impact on reducing carrying costs.

Quantify your achievements in pricing strategy at Zast Logisolutions by explicitly stating how your data-driven approach improved **inventory turnover ratio** and reduced **stock out** percentages. Use specific metrics to showcase your impact on the bottom line.

Add **NetSuite**, **Zoho**, or **Unicommerce** to your skills section. Elaborate on your experience with any of these **ERP** systems under the Zast Logisolutions role, describing how you used them to manage inventory and improve operational efficiency.

Demonstrate your understanding of **FOFO franchise** models by mentioning any experience you have in managing inventory across franchised locations. Highlight your ability to optimize **replenishment** and ensure consistent product availability, addressing a key requirement of the role.

Include a section detailing your analytical approach to identifying and addressing **slow-moving and overstocked items**. Mention specific methodologies you employed, such as **EOQ**, and quantify the financial benefits realized through reduced obsolescence costs.

demand forecasting.DESCRIPTION: Learn the concepts of forecasting demand and how to ensure your business meets customer demand without fail.
Master forecasting techniques to make data-driven decisions and predict future trends. Includes time series analysis and regression.
Learn demand forecasting concepts through practical examples and statistical models.

replenishment.DESCRIPTION: Learn about inventory basics to improve the financial position of your company. This includes how to properly manage and replenish stock.

replenishment.COURSE_NAME: Supply Chain Management: Inventory Planning and Replenishment
replenishment.DESCRIPTION: Discover what triggers ordering, how to analyze trends for accuracy and how to choose the right approach for your company.
Learn basics of inventory mangement and replenishment with examples.

ABC classification.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to classify inventory using ABC analysis to focus on the most critical items.
Explore inventory management techniques, including ABC analysis, to optimize inventory control.
Learn the basics of inventory management with ABC analysis.

EOQ.COURSE_NAME: Inventory Management: EOQ & Quantity Discount Models
EOQ.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to calculate the Economic Order Quantity (EOQ) to minimize total inventory costs.
Understand how to calculate Economic Order Quantity and interpret inventory levels.
Learn how to use EOQ to calculate order quantity.

NetSuite.DESCRIPTION: Learn about NetSuite basics including how to navigate the system, track sales and manage inventory.
The entire NetSuite ERP system from A-Z. Learn accounting, inventory, CRM and more!
Basics of the NetSuite platform and navigating it.

Zoho.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to implement the Zoho Inventory product for any small and medium size business.
Learn about the various inventory options within Zoho with this Zoho-created course.
Full, free tutorial on how to use the Zoho Inventory platform.

Unicommerce.DESCRIPTION: Vendor training program for Unicommerce platform.
Unicommerce training platform for new users.
Unicommerce basics including how to operate.
